metadata.title: CVE-2018-16982 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: Open Chinese Convert (OpenCC) 1.0.5 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) because BinaryDict::NewFromFile in BinaryDict.cpp may have out-of-bounds keyOffset and valueOffset values via a crafted .ocd file.

criterions.comment: opencc package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
